name: WorldPopulation
0:
”Alexa, open world population”
”Alexa, ask world population how many people live in Spain”
”Alexa, tell world population what's the population of France”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: world population
des: Give me a country name, and I will tell you its total population, also specifying how many men and women live there.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
